todo: Set a Budget
Guest list
Research about the traditional wedding rites and culture of both parties
Decide the theme color for the engagement/introduction and the wedding
Pick a venue for the introduction (Usually the brideâ€™s family house)
Have the couple attend necessary marriage classes for the church wedding(optional)
Pick a date for the traditional and church wedding (not too far apart)
Find a venue
Decide the theme color for the wedding
Have the bride and groom pick out their bridesmaid and groomsmen (optional)
Contact the caterer for food arrangements
Order a wedding cake and have the bride approve a design
Hire decorators for the venue
Have the bride fit her dress
Hire a make-up artist
Plan out the table setting and stage setting with the decorator
Hire a limo or fancy car (optional)
Hire a photographer and videographer
Organize a pre-wedding photoshoot (optional)
Invite the guests
Have the couple plan out their honey moon in advance
Plan souvenirs
Walk through the wedding with the couple
The day before the wedding have the bride make her hair and get her nails done and have the groom get a haircut/styled
Delegate someone to monitor the cake and catering services
Supervise on the day of the wedding that everything goes according to plan
Ensure all payments are made
